Hi,

> And thanks for the kudos on W3! Things have sure been busy around here the
> last month or so because of it ...

I can imagine :)

> have any of you tried the special
> single-player map that lets four players go through in a Diablo-style map?
> It's a pretty neat warping of the game :)

I went through it, very interesting!
I haven't yet looked at the  editor's scripting system however it might be
possible to actually replicate glad scenarios in the editor, with some work
:)

- Deathifier
